overview: Al is the Founder/CEO of AdNexus Media, a performance marketing company that helps institutions acquire customers. Prior to his current role, Al was at Northstar Capital Partners and is currently on the board of AquTel, a customer acquisition company that utilizes telemarketing and offline channels. Prior to Northstar, Al was at the higher education division of Kaplan, Inc. He started his career at WildCard Systems, a Sutter Hill Ventures portfolio company in the online payments sector.
